Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: handydave
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little system, clear crisp video. It took me about 30 minutes to install. simple set up. multiple door bell chimes to select from.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: susan
Reviews.Content: This is a great product works well .... It could of came with longer wires so we didnt have to splice into it but it works great ..

Reviews.Title: Very nice Video Door Phone
Reviews.Author: J. Morbit "music lover"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my parents property that has two gates on electronic gate openers so that we could see and hear visitors and delivery personnel at each gate.  I have not hooked it up yet because I am trying to track down the wires in the house from the old cameras, but I did test the system in the house and it works very well especially the night vision.  I will update when I can finally complete the install.Update:I finished the install back in June of this year (2013), and the product works very well the buzzer and the video feed is clear and the MICs work very well.  The video has a strange hue to it, some things are kind of lavender but I think it is a problem with the cable that has been buried for several years and the run is close to 200 feet.  If I could have I would have run new cable from the gates to the house but I did not have access to a ditch-witch at the time, maybe later.

Reviews.Title: very good product
Reviews.Author: carlos contreras
Reviews.Content: this is a very good product. hi quality video signal, i have to video cameras and both of them works very good.

Reviews.Title: Nice device for the price
Reviews.Author: Ronni Silva
Reviews.Content: Pros: Price, protection around cameras, robust enough for outside gates usageCons: Wires provided could be of better quality and a bit longer, unless you leave in NYCity and your door\gate is at the street edge.

Reviews.Title: 7" LCD HOME SECURITY VIDEO DOOR PHONE
Reviews.Author: John Mc Neely
Reviews.Content: I AM VERY PLEASED WITH THE UNIT IT IS UP AND RUNNING AND I COULD NOT ASK FOR A BETTER PICTURE IT IS GREAT. IF YOU WANT SOMETHING TO DO A GOOD JOB THEN BUY THIS UNIT. P.S. LOVE IT.

Reviews.Title: I'm not happy with the product
Reviews.Author: dd
Reviews.Content: The product looks like it was previously used. Whereas, it's been advertised as brand new. I'm actually thinking of returning it. I'm not satisfied.
